name: 5th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Robotics
content: Call for paper 5th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Robotics (ICAIR 2020) July . 16-18, 2020 / Dalian, China http://www.icair.net/ 5th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Robotics (ICAIR 2020), which is in conjunction with the 5th International Conference on Automation, Control and Robotics Engineering (CACRE 2020), the ICAIR 2020 is Dalian Maritime University and Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME), sponsored by Georgia Institute of Technology and Sichuan University. The conference will be held at Dalian, China from July 16 to 18, 2020\. ●Publication and Indexing All submissions will be peer reviewed, and all the registered and presented papers will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other indexing organizations. ●Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: Robotics Science and Engineering & Control Virtual Systems Artificial Intelligence Networked and Distributed Intelligent Control Natural language processing Software tools for AI More topics can be found at: http://www.icair.net/cfp.html ●Paper Submission 1.You can choose to submit your paper directly to icair@smehk.org 2.You can submit your full paper through electronic submission system: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ICAIR2020 ●Call for participants 1, Presenter: If you are interested in giving presentation on conference,without publishing your paper in the proceeding, you need to submit the abstract and title of your presentation to us:icair@smehk.org 2, Listener: You are welcome to attend this great event. You need to complete the registration as Listener before the registration dealdine. 3, Reviewer: We sincerely welcome professors, associate professors, teachers and other experts in the areas of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics join the conference as a reviewer. ●Contact Us: If you have any question, please feel free to contact our conference secretary. Ms. Amber Cao Tel:+852-30506862 Email :icair@smehk.org http://www.icair.net/
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME)
